scenarios.name: 明星合影
prompt_templates: A fan visiting movie set with {character}, {scene}. The fan is excited to meet the movie star, standing side-by-side for photo, natural happy expression.
Behind-the-scenes photo with {character} on film set, {scene}, authentic movie production atmosphere.

styles.name: 电影片场
styles.prompt: on film set with crew members, cameras, lighting equipment, behind-the-scenes atmosphere

styles.name: 首映礼
styles.prompt: at movie premiere, red carpet event, flash photography, glamorous atmosphere

styles.name: 粉丝见面会
styles.prompt: at fan meet-and-greet event, friendly interaction, casual atmosphere

scenarios.name: 个人写真
prompt_templates: Professional portrait photography, {style}, {lighting}, {background}. High quality, detailed facial features, realistic skin texture.
Studio portrait session, {style}, professional lighting setup, {background}. 8k resolution, photorealistic.

scenarios.name: 双人合影
prompt_templates: Two people standing together, {pose}, {style}, {scene}. Natural interaction, genuine emotion.
Couple portrait, {pose}, {style}, {scene}. Intimate atmosphere, romantic lighting.

types.name: 情侣合影
types.prompt: romantic couple, intimate moment, loving atmosphere

types.name: 朋友合影
types.prompt: best friends, friendly interaction, casual atmosphere

scenarios.name: 全家合影
prompt_templates: Family portrait with exactly {count} people, {style}, {scene}. Happy family atmosphere, natural expressions.
Traditional family photo, {count} family members, {style}, {scene}. Warm and loving atmosphere.
